title: Rosario Dawson gushes she is 'absolutely in love' with Cory Booker
text:
Rosario Dawson is head over heels for Corey Booker.

The 40-year-old actress has spent about a year dating the 50-year-old senator, who is running in the Democratic presidential primary.

'I'm in love! I am absolutely in love, and it is so exciting,' Rosario spilled in a new profile for the Washington Post.

A fine romance: 'I'm in love! I am absolutely in love, and it is so exciting,' Rosario Dawson told the Washington Post of her boyfriend Cory Booker

'For my whole life, I've always felt like, even when I got into a relationship, I was trying to be the center of the storm and everything was just this maelstrom out there.

'But for the first time, I feel like I have someone in the center of the storm with me,' said Rosario, whose new movie Zombieland: Double Tap bowed Friday.

Her mother Isabel Celeste also spoke out, admitting she was originally skeptical about Cory and was formerly a staunch supporter of his current primary opponent Bernie Sanders.

Though she told him: 'You don't get my vote,' when they were first introduced, Isabel, a singer and writer, now hears wedding bells in the future.

Companionship: Rosario, whose new movie Zombieland: Double Tap bowed Friday, shared that 'for the first time, I feel like I have someone in the center of the storm with me'

'He's young, he's hard-working, he's stoic, he's amazing, he's probably going to marry my daughter and shut the front door,' she shared.

Cory, who has previously been linked to 30-year-old Instagram poet Cleo Wade, remembered zero chemistry when he and Rosario first met last summer at a political fundraiser.

'There was no love connection there. I think it was the places of life we were in. I was probably dating somebody when we first met,' he shared.

Rosario, who broke up with comic Eric Andre near the end of 2017, had more of a rapport with Cory when they crossed paths again that October.

Acquired taste: Her mother Isabel Celeste was originally skeptical about Cory and was once a staunch supporter of his current primary opponent Bernie Sanders

'I mean, gosh, that night we talked for hours and hours,' recalled Cory, saying that when their chat was wrapping up 'I had trouble asking for her phone number.'

He dished: 'I think I said something really stupid like: 'Uh, how would I get in touch with you?' And she mercifully said something like: 'Oh, you want my phone number?' And my insides were like: 'Hell, yeah!''

The fourth Democratic primary debate of this cycle, which occurred this Tuesday in Ohio, was the first one Rosario attended.

'He's amazing': Though she told him: 'You don't get my vote,' when they were first introduced, Isabel, a singer and writer, now hears wedding bells in the future

She is the proud mother of 17-year-old daughter Lola, whom she adopted in 2014 when she was 12 years old.

Rosario, who has also dated Joshua Jackson, Danny Boyle, Eli Roth and Colin Farrell, went public about her romance with Cory this March.

There have also been unconfirmed rumors in the past linking her to such names as Gerard Butler, Jay-Z and Quentin Tarantino.
description: Rosario Dawson is head over heels for Corey Booker. The 40-year-old actress has spent about a year dating the 50-year-old senator, who is running in the Democratic presidential primary.
